Instantly.AddIRCMessage: @channel Everybody is ready for the conference?
Yes, I think everything is set
Yeah, so, who is going to speak to our squad exactly?
FBI special agent Gale and EnTech digital security assistant Diana
Interesting company we have here
Ok, they going to connect in 5...
!ANNOUNCEMENT! GALE MAUER CONNECTED TO THE SERVER @channel
!ANNOUNCEMENT! DIANA FRASER CONNECTED TO THE SERVER @channel
Greetings ladies and gentlemen, my name is Gale Mauer, special agent of Federal Bureau of Investigation
I am with the representative of the EnTech company Diana, and I am assigning her to your squad as your assistant in the next mission
Hello everyone
But we will get back to it a bit later. We heard about Medical Archive attack. Did you apprehend the hacker who is responsible for that attack?
Yes sir, his name is Daedra, he planned this attack together with his partner-in-crime hacker Repulse, they had a contract from yet unknown client to steal Olivia Brooks' Med File
Any info on the Client?
Bloyd?
Her name is Sandra Brooks, sister of Olivia, her intentions are unknown, we will get everything from her after interrigation with detectives
Well if that's not a terrorist attack then nothing serious for my division
As I said, I have assignment for your squad
There was a digital break-in last night on one of our secured servers
They seem to have acquired an SSL breaker tool, so they passed our security and stolen some confidential data, leaving no tracks at all, even disconnect logs
They are working as a professional team, using sequencer tool for a team hack, and forkbomb for invisible disconnection after clearing logs
Right, but a few hours ago we detected a disconnection log on one of the servers and most probably this is their gateway
I want you to turn their infrastructure upside down and get me their detailed information, location, everything
Roger that sir, we will do our best!
Good luck to you ladies and gentlemen, and remember that Ms. Diana will provide any kind of help
Good bye sir!
Good luck sir!
Bye sir!
Good bye sir!
!ANNOUNCEMENT! GALE MOWER DISCONNECTED FROM THE SERVER @channel
@channel CONFERENCE IS OVER!
Well team, I think it is time to start digging
@channel I uploaded an incident report to your mission hub
